Name: Adult Toy Store
About the game: The background of the game is in a town with 2,000 inhabitants Content of the game is to run a sex toys shop, [Store layout, hiring staff, developing a variety of fun merchandise to meet the needs of customers] (But in fact this is not the focus of the game ...) ------------------------------------------------------------ you must: 1) Use all means to 'satisfy' every customer! 2) 'Educate' every clerk! 3) Beat your competitors! Before he defeats you... (Every inhabitant of the city has a different personality, occupation and hobbies) ------------------------------------------------------------ Finally, remember three things: 1) In addition to sex, keep the physical power to take care of the store 2) always carry self-defense weapons 3) Always use the fastest speed to drive away the underage customers! [thank you for playing my game]
